concept.title: Saving in Beermat
concept.shortdesc: Beermat editor saves opened files as SVG, but also has the ability to export SVG's to other formats.

section.p:
Save works in line with all eclipse editors, accessed through
File Save
, or the save shortcut on your OS.
Using the Save as on the File menu, an SVG can be exported as a PNG or JPEG, the original SVG is still retained for further editing.
